name: Canada
historySummary: Canada is a North American country known for its vast landscapes, multicultural society, and strong economy. It is a constitutional monarchy with a parliamentary democracy.
joke: Why did the Canadian cross the road? To get to the Tim Hortons on the other side, eh!

name: United States
historySummary: The United States is a diverse and influential country in North America. It has a history of immigration, innovation, and global leadership.
joke: Why did the American football player go to the bank? To get his quarterback!

name: Mexico
historySummary: Mexico is a country in North America known for its rich culture, history, and cuisine. It has a diverse landscape, including mountains, deserts, and beaches.
joke: Why don't Mexicans ever have accidents? Because they take things Juan step at a time!

name: Guatemala
historySummary: Guatemala is a Central American country known for its Mayan heritage and diverse landscapes. It has faced political and social challenges but is working towards stability.
joke: Why did the Guatemalan farmer bring a ladder to the bar? Because he heard the drinks were on the house!

name: Belize
historySummary: Belize is a small country in Central America known for its natural beauty and biodiversity. It was formerly known as British Honduras.
joke: Why did the Belizean fisherman always carry a pencil? In case he caught a draw-fish!

name: El Salvador
historySummary: El Salvador is a Central American country known for its history of civil conflict and challenges. It is working on social and economic development.
joke: Why did the El Salvadoran musician start a band? Because they wanted to play 'salvadorable' music!

name: Honduras
historySummary: Honduras is a Central American country known for its natural beauty and challenges such as political instability and poverty. It is working towards development.
joke: Why did the Honduran soccer player bring string to the game? Because they wanted to tie the score!

name: Nicaragua
historySummary: Nicaragua is a Central American country known for its lakes and volcanoes. It has faced political turmoil and is striving for stability and development.
joke: Why did the Nicaraguan computer scientist create a password? To protect their 'Nica-identity' online!

name: Costa Rica
historySummary: Costa Rica is a Central American country known for its natural beauty, biodiversity, and commitment to environmental conservation. It has a stable democracy.
joke: Why did the Costa Rican surfer bring a ladder to the beach? Because they heard the waves were high!

name: Panama
historySummary: Panama is a Central American country known for its canal, connecting the Atlantic and Pacific Oceans. It has a diverse economy and cultural heritage.
joke: Why did the Panamanian chef open a seafood restaurant? Because they wanted to 'canal' all the flavors!

name: Jamaica
historySummary: Jamaica is an island country in the Caribbean known for its reggae music, beautiful beaches, and cultural heritage. It gained independence from the UK in 1962.
joke: Why did the Jamaican musician start a band? Because they wanted to 'riddim' the world with their music!

name: Haiti
historySummary: Haiti is a Caribbean country known for its history of revolution and struggle. It was the first independent nation in Latin America and the Caribbean.
joke: Why did the Haitian painter become famous? Because their art was 'haitian' to be amazing!

name: Dominican Republic
historySummary: The Dominican Republic shares the island of Hispaniola with Haiti. It is known for its beautiful beaches, tourism, and cultural diversity.
joke: Why did the Dominican baseball player bring a ladder to the game? Because they wanted to 'Dominiclimb' the ranks!

name: Cuba
historySummary: Cuba is a Caribbean island nation known for its history, culture, and revolutionary past. It has a socialist system and is known for its music and cigars.
joke: Why did the Cuban chef open a restaurant? Because they wanted to 'Havana' great dining experience!

name: The Bahamas
historySummary: The Bahamas is an island nation in the Atlantic Ocean known for its beautiful beaches and tourism. It is a constitutional monarchy and a Commonwealth realm.
joke: Why did the Bahamian sailor always bring a map to the beach? Because they wanted to navigate the 'Bahama' waters!

name: Trinidad and Tobago
historySummary: Trinidad and Tobago is a Caribbean nation known for its multicultural society, carnival celebrations, and natural beauty. It gained independence from the UK in 1962.
religion: Religious diversity, mainly Christianity and Hinduism
joke: Why did the Trinidadian dancer always bring a music player to the beach? Because they wanted to 'Trini-tune' their moves!

name: Bermuda
historySummary: Bermuda is a British Overseas Territory in the North Atlantic Ocean known for its pink sand beaches and tourism. It has a parliamentary democracy.
joke: Why did the Bermudian swimmer bring a towel to the beach? Because they wanted to 'bermuda-towel' off!

name: Saint Pierre and Miquelon
historySummary: Saint Pierre and Miquelon is an overseas collectivity of France located off the coast of Newfoundland, Canada. It is known for its French heritage.
joke: Why did the Saint Pierre and Miquelon chef open a bakery? Because they wanted to 'pierre-fect' their pastries!

name: Greenland
historySummary: Greenland is an autonomous territory within the Kingdom of Denmark. It is known for its Arctic landscapes, glaciers, and Inuit culture.
joke: Why did the Greenlandic explorer always carry a compass? Because they wanted to 'point' the way to adventure!

name: Saint Kitts and Nevis
historySummary: Saint Kitts and Nevis is a small island nation in the Caribbean known for its beaches and historic sites. It gained independence from the UK in 1983.
joke: Why did the Saint Kitts and Nevis chef start a restaurant? Because they wanted to 'nevis' the best Caribbean cuisine!

name: Antigua and Barbuda
historySummary: Antigua and Barbuda is an island nation in the Caribbean known for its beaches, tourism, and historic sites. It gained independence from the UK in 1981.
joke: Why did the Antiguan and Barbudan sailor bring a map to the beach? Because they wanted to navigate the 'bar-buda' waters!

name: Saint Lucia
historySummary: Saint Lucia is an island nation in the Caribbean known for its natural beauty, beaches, and cultural heritage. It gained independence from the UK in 1979.
joke: Why did the Saint Lucian musician start a band? Because they wanted to 'lucia' up the Caribbean with their tunes!

name: Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
historySummary: Saint Vincent and the Grenadines is an island nation in the Caribbean known for its natural beauty, sailing, and cultural heritage. It gained independence from the UK in 1979.
joke: Why did the Saint Vincent and the Grenadines chef open a restaurant? Because they wanted to 'grenadine' the best Caribbean flavors!

name: Grenada
historySummary: Grenada is an island nation in the Caribbean known for its natural beauty, spice production, and cultural heritage. It gained independence from the UK in 1974.
joke: Why did the Grenadian gardener always bring a rake to the beach? Because they wanted to 'rake' in the beach vibes!

name: Barbados
historySummary: Barbados is an island nation in the Caribbean known for its beautiful beaches, tourism, and cultural heritage. It gained independence from the UK in 1966.
joke: Why did the Barbadian chef start a restaurant? Because they wanted to 'barbado' the best Caribbean cuisine!

name: Dominica
historySummary: Dominica is an island nation in the Caribbean known for its natural beauty, rainforests, and cultural heritage. It gained independence from the UK in 1978.
joke: Why did the Dominican musician start a band? Because they wanted to 'domini-rock' the Caribbean with their music!
